column3: â€œvery relaxing high. I'm litâ€

â€œI had to smoke this a few times to feel confident in understanding it enough to review it. a solid smoke but was definitely not the knockout night time indica that the budtender described it as. its a lazy feeling but feels headier more than body. i work a very fast paced physical job and i seek indicas to give me pain relief and help me get to sleep after getting off work very late. this tastes good, smokes, good an...â€
â€œWonderful high, best sex weed we've found, hits hard so you don't need muchâ€

â€œThe strain is the best Weed I've smoked besides Gorilla glue! Taste great, hits smooth,and leaves you high for hours! Best for night time use to go to sleep! This strain will have you feeling good and dreaming right away!!ğŸ˜†Good for pain too!â€

â€œIt's currently 3:43 and I'm laying in my bathroom listening to music because I have trouble sleeping. This shit is a must!!! This is a strain where you could watch tv and pass out whenever you want. Great for late night Seshs.â€

â€œThis strain gave me an ear to ear grin for five minutes the first time. Very solid strain alert and lit at the same time for awhile with a good night's sleep to finish it off. Worked great with my epilepsy.â€
â€œPerfect for helping me come down from my manic states (bipolar II) and smells/tastes deliciousâ€
â€œThis strain is an invigorating buzz that starts in the head and flows through the whole body. ğŸ˜â€
â€œSuper fire.  Smells like a reek of sour gas and pink lemonade in concentrate form (Golden Goo from NWCS).â€
â€œDank af. Like a cherry fart but smoother. Peeeeeeace $$$$$$$$$$â€

â€œThis is the first strain I have given 5 stars. first of all, it's delicious. nice creamy cherry on the exhale. the next thing you know, you're like really happy. finally the pain melts away, and that happy light feeling lasts quite awhile. I've been able to toke this throughout the day and feel relaxed without being sedated. It's hard for me to find an all day pain relief strain that doesn't give me dumb head!â€
â€œOooooweeeee! This strain is so damn delicious! You should try it for the taste alone. Tinglyâ€
â€œVery nice, it gave me a cerebral high along with a body highâ€
â€œAt this point I've have both of the wax and weed strain and they are both flame. But by far favorite is the weed strain it's a great high. Couch lock for sure 100%â€
â€œLove Cherry Pie, so this child will do me just FINE (Fuc*#d Up, Insecure, Neurotic, Emotional). A great state to be in after being up 24hrs. Low key, mellow, relaxed.â€
â€œthis strain is pretty mellow. It takes more to get super messed up but the ride is nice and floaty. really good to relax and watch TV to because you're relaxed and alert at the same time.â€
â€œMy starter strain that is amazing tastes great and smeels sooo good its such a unique smell no other buds comapre to that sweet sour smellâ€
â€œStrain was awesome good relaxing high and excellent size mugsâ€
â€œnice smoke, sour cherry exhale, pretty goodâ€

â€œFirst review ever after being on here for awhile, but I love this strain. As someone who uses cannabis for recreational and occasionally medical, I LOVE this strain, bought a cheaper bho cartridge and I can still taste that tangy cherry, with a little hint of cream at the end to give it a sherbet taste. Completely barraged me with relaxation and a care-free feeling, great if you need an escape for a day. Only reason ...â€
â€œThis weed smells super super good. The high is very relaxing. Great Bud.â€

â€œVery purple bud with great floral scents. Smooth smoke with a great high, I was not couch locked but more relaxed and able to carry on my day.
Taste was same through a pipe loaded bowl from green to dust. Very floral tastingâ€
â€œNice smooth high relaxingâ€

â€œStrong cherry and other heavy berry aromas as well as exhale aftertaste. A good body relaxer/tingler strain but only gives you a brief moment of intensity then mellows out. In my opinion this is a solid beginner strain for people needing severe/moderate pain relief.â€
â€œSmooth pulls, sweet taste, amazing smell. Made me hungry and super sleepy. Loved it.â€

â€œNot a fan at first. I didnâ€™t read any information on it before smoking some. Definitely different types of effects than Iâ€™m used to. Made my whole body feel tingly and warm. You can really feel it behind your eyes almost right away.â€
â€œIt didn't make me sleepy or relaxed enough.  It has a strong smell when in the Pre-Roll container.â€

â€œDisappointed. Got the worst anxiety from this.. it put me in the hospital. I typically don't go for hybrid anything, and stick with heavy indicas, but the bud tender recommended it for me. Unusual case? smoked it again today.. did even realize until I was numb in the face. never again!â€
